items.title: Stocks to Watch Today: Divis Labs, Premier Energies, Delhivery, Dr Reddys, Bharat Electronics, KEC International, Sun Pharma, PNC Infratech in focus on 19 May
items.description: Stocks to Watch, 19 May: Stocks like Zen Technologies, Arvind Fashions, Galaxy Surfactants, KRBL, Kalpataru Projects International, IOL Chemicals, Repco Home Finance, CreditAccess Grameen, Dhampur Sugar Mills, Gujarat Alkalies, Kaynes Technology India, Texmaco Rail & Engineering, Sterlite Technologies, and Dr Reddy's Laboratories will be in focus on May 19.

items.title: Agri Picks Report May 19, 2025: Geojit Financial Services
items.description: According to Geojit Financial Services, Sowing of summer crops in Maharashtra rose more than 21% to 510,538 hectares as of Tuesday from 421,706 hectares a year ago, according to a report released by the state agriculture department.

items.title: Live: Can Sensex, Nifty extend its rally this week? | Opening Bell
items.description: The Sensex and Nifty ended flat in the previous session, even as buying momentum remained strong in the broader markets. The Nifty notched a 4% weekly gain—its best since October 4, 2024—while the Nifty Midcap 100 and Smallcap 100 indices soared 7% and 9%, respectively. On the earnings front, key Q4 results this week include ITC, Sun Pharma, and IndusInd Bank, with Power Grid and Pfizer among the companies reporting today. This morning, global cues were largely lower. US stock futures slid overnight as investors parsed Moody's credit rating downgrade. Similarly, Asian markets slid in early trade ahead of a slew of economic data. Catch Lovisha Darad in conversation with Rajesh Palviya, Senior Vice President Research (Head Technical & Derivatives) at Axis Securities and Daljit Singh Kohli, Head -Equity, Roha Asset Managers LLP.

items.title: NCC Limited: Strong order book provides growth visibility
items.description: NCC received record order inflows in Q4FY25 and emerged L1 (lowest bidder) in several projects. It has indicated strong order inflow for FY26, indicating that infrastructure development opportunity remains huge.

items.description: LKP Research recommended accumulate rating on Endurance Technologies with a target price of Rs 2386 in its research report dated May 19, 2025.

items.title: Live: Nifty extends loss to 2nd day, slips below 25,000 | Closing Bell
items.description: Sensex, Nifty Extend Loss To Second Day. Sensex Slips Over 200 Points, Nifty Below 25k. Midcap, Smallcap Indices Continue To Exhibit Strength. Market Breadth Positive; 2:1 Advance-decline Ratio. It Stocks Suffer On Moody's Us Credit Downgrade. Psu Banks, Realty Stocks Outperform. Volatility Rises, India Vix Jumps 5(%). Nifty 50 Gainers: Bajaj Auto, Shriram Finance, Power Grid. Nifty 50 Losers: Eternal, Grasim, Infosys. Catch Lovisha Darad and Yatin Mota as they discuss stocks on their radar.

items.title: Can merchant bankers be allowed to control SME IPO funds? SEBI's recent orders expose risk in the system
